Concept.label: Crypto Asset Fair Value
Concept.description: <nil>

Concept.name: DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet
Concept.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
Concept.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

Concept.name: Goodwill
Concept.label: Goodwill
Concept.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

Concept.name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAmortization
Concept.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
Concept.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

Concept.name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross
Concept.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
Concept.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

Concept.name: FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet
Concept.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
Concept.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

Concept.name: IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoodwill
Concept.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
Concept.description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

Concept.name: IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill
Concept.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
Concept.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

Children.Label: [G]Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss

Concept.name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLosses
Concept.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
Concept.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

Concept.name: NotesReceivableNet
Concept.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
Concept.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

Concept.name: AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Concept.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
Concept.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

Concept.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross
Concept.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
Concept.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

Concept.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet
Concept.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
Concept.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

Concept.name: InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
Concept.label: Interest Payable
Concept.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

Concept.name: ContractWithCustomerLiability
Concept.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
Concept.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseLiability
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Liability
Concept.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

Concept.name: Liabilities
Concept.label: Liabilities
Concept.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

Concept.name: LineOfCredit
Concept.label: Long-term Line of Credit
Concept.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

Concept.name: LongTermDebt
Concept.label: Long-term Debt
Concept.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

Concept.name: OperatingLeaseLiability
Concept.label: Operating Lease, Liability
Concept.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

Concept.name: LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity
Concept.label: Liabilities and Equity
Concept.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

Children.Label: Limited Liability Company LLC Members Equity Including Portion Attributable To Noncontrolling Interest
Limited Liability Company LLC Members Equity

Concept.name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax
Concept.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Concept.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

Concept.name: RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit
Concept.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
Concept.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Children.Label: [G]Partners' Capital, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
[G]Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax

Concept.name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax
Concept.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Concept.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

Concept.name: RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit
Concept.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
Concept.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Children.Label: [G]Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: MinorityInterest
Concept.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

Children.Label: [G]Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax

Concept.name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax
Concept.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Concept.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

Concept.name: AdditionalPaidInCapital
Concept.label: Additional Paid in Capital
Concept.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

Concept.name: AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock
Concept.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
Concept.description: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

Concept.name: CommonStockValue
Concept.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
Concept.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

Concept.name: PreferredStockValue
Concept.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
Concept.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

Concept.name: RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit
Concept.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
Concept.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Concept.name: StockholdersEquity
Concept.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
Concept.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

Concept.name: StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

Children.Label: Stockholders Equity Number Of Shares Par Value And Other Disclosures
Common Stock Number Of Shares Par Value And Other Disclosures

Concept.name: CommonStockValue
Concept.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
Concept.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

Children.Label: Preferred Stock Number Of Shares Par Value And Other Disclosures

Concept.name: PreferredStockValue
Concept.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
Concept.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

Children.Label: [G]Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interests

Concept.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCarryingAmount
Concept.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Carrying Amount
Concept.description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

Concept.name: TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributableToParent
Concept.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Attributable to Parent
Concept.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

Concept.name: TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Concept.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interests
Concept.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent and noncontrolling interests, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

Children.Label: [G]Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
Minority Interest In Net Income Loss Of Consolidated Entities

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: NetIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
Concept.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Children.Label: Net Income Loss Attributable To Reporting Entity
[G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
[G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Children.Label: [G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
Concept.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Concept.name: DebtRelatedCommitmentFeesAndDebtIssuanceCosts
Concept.label: Debt Related Commitment Fees and Debt Issuance Costs
Concept.description: Represents the charge against earnings during the period for commitment fees and debt issuance expenses.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseInterestExpense
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
Concept.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

Concept.name: InterestExpenseDebt
Concept.label: Interest Expense, Debt
Concept.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

Concept.name: InterestExpenseNonoperating
Concept.label: Interest Expense Nonoperating
Concept.description: <nil>

Concept.name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBeforeTax
Concept.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
Concept.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

Concept.name: InvestmentIncomeInterest
Concept.label: Investment Income, Interest
Concept.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Concept.name: GainLossOnInvestments
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
Concept.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncome
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income
Concept.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
Concept.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Children.Label: [G]Cost of Goods and Service, Excluding Depreciation, Depletion, and Amortization

Concept.name: CostOfGoodsSoldSalesTypeLease
Concept.label: Cost of Goods Sold, Sales-type Lease
Concept.description: Cost of goods sold for sales-type financing lease.

Concept.name: InventoryWriteDown
Concept.label: Inventory Write-down
Concept.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

Concept.name: CostOfRevenue
Concept.label: Cost of Revenue
Concept.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

Concept.name: GrossProfit
Concept.label: Gross Profit
Concept.description: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

Concept.name: Revenues
Concept.label: Revenues
Concept.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Concept.name: SalesTypeLeaseRevenue
Concept.label: Sales-type Lease, Revenue
Concept.description: Amount of sales-type lease revenue.

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment

Concept.name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

Concept.name: AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
Concept.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

Concept.name: DepreciationAndAmortization
Concept.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
Concept.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

Concept.name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense
Concept.label: Research and Development Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate costs incurred (1) in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or (2) to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or the entity's use, during the reporting period charged to research and development projects, including the costs of developing computer software up to the point in time of achieving technological feasibility, and costs allocated in accounting for a business combination to in-process projects deemed to have no alternative future use.

Concept.name: GoodwillImpairmentLoss
Concept.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
Concept.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

Concept.name: ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefinitelivedExcludingGoodwill
Concept.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
Concept.description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

Concept.name: BusinessExitCosts1
Concept.label: Business Exit Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Includes, but is not limited to, one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and termination benefits associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement. Excludes expenses associated with special or contractual termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: SeveranceCosts1
Concept.label: Severance Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: OperatingExpenses
Concept.label: Operating Expenses
Concept.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

Concept.name: OperatingLeaseExpense
Concept.label: Operating Lease, Expense
Concept.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

Concept.name: MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense
Concept.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
Concept.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

Concept.name: ProductWarrantyExpense
Concept.label: Product Warranty Expense
Concept.description: The expense charged against earnings for the period pertaining to standard and extended warranties on the entity's goods and services granted to customers.

Concept.name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Concept.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Concept.name: OperatingIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Operating Income (Loss)
Concept.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Concept.name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
Concept.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
Concept.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Concept.name: ProfitLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasic
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
Concept.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

Children.Label: [G]Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Tax
[G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Children.Label: [G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt

Concept.name: InterestExpenseDebt
Concept.label: Interest Expense, Debt

Concept.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
Concept.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

Concept.name: InvestmentIncomeInterest
Concept.label: Investment Income, Interest
Concept.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Concept.name: GainLossOnInvestments
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
Concept.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncome
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income
Concept.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
Concept.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Concept.name: OperatingIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Operating Income (Loss)
Concept.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Children.Label: [G]Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
Minority Interest In Net Income Loss Of Consolidated Entities

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: NetIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
Concept.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Children.Label: Net Income Loss Attributable To Reporting Entity
[G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
[G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Children.Label: [G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
Concept.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Concept.name: DebtRelatedCommitmentFeesAndDebtIssuanceCosts
Concept.label: Debt Related Commitment Fees and Debt Issuance Costs
Concept.description: Represents the charge against earnings during the period for commitment fees and debt issuance expenses.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseInterestExpense
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
Concept.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

Concept.name: InterestExpenseDebt
Concept.label: Interest Expense, Debt
Concept.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

Concept.name: InterestExpenseNonoperating
Concept.label: Interest Expense Nonoperating
Concept.description: <nil>

Concept.name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBeforeTax
Concept.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
Concept.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

Concept.name: InvestmentIncomeInterest
Concept.label: Investment Income, Interest
Concept.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Concept.name: GainLossOnInvestments
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
Concept.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncome
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income
Concept.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
Concept.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Children.Label: [G]Cost of Goods and Service, Excluding Depreciation, Depletion, and Amortization

Concept.name: InventoryWriteDown
Concept.label: Inventory Write-down
Concept.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

Concept.name: CostOfRevenue
Concept.label: Cost of Revenue
Concept.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment

Concept.name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

Concept.name: AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
Concept.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

Concept.name: DepreciationAndAmortization
Concept.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
Concept.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

Concept.name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense
Concept.label: Research and Development Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate costs incurred (1) in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or (2) to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or the entity's use, during the reporting period charged to research and development projects, including the costs of developing computer software up to the point in time of achieving technological feasibility, and costs allocated in accounting for a business combination to in-process projects deemed to have no alternative future use.

Concept.name: GoodwillImpairmentLoss
Concept.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
Concept.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

Concept.name: ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefinitelivedExcludingGoodwill
Concept.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
Concept.description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

Concept.name: BusinessExitCosts1
Concept.label: Business Exit Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Includes, but is not limited to, one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and termination benefits associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement. Excludes expenses associated with special or contractual termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: SeveranceCosts1
Concept.label: Severance Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: OperatingExpenses
Concept.label: Operating Expenses
Concept.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

Concept.name: OperatingLeaseExpense
Concept.label: Operating Lease, Expense
Concept.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

Concept.name: MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense
Concept.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
Concept.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

Concept.name: ProductWarrantyExpense
Concept.label: Product Warranty Expense
Concept.description: The expense charged against earnings for the period pertaining to standard and extended warranties on the entity's goods and services granted to customers.

Concept.name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Concept.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Concept.name: OperatingIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Operating Income (Loss)
Concept.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Concept.name: Revenues
Concept.label: Revenues
Concept.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Concept.name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
Concept.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
Concept.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Concept.name: ProfitLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasic
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
Concept.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

Concept.name: MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense
Concept.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
Concept.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

Concept.name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Concept.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Concept.name: GainLossOnInvestments
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
Concept.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

Concept.name: Revenues
Concept.label: Revenues
Concept.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Concept.name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
Concept.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
Concept.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Concept.name: ProfitLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasic
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
Concept.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

Concept.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

Concept.name: InterestExpenseNonoperating
Concept.label: Interest Expense Nonoperating
Concept.description: <nil>

Concept.name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBeforeTax
Concept.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
Concept.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

Concept.name: InvestmentIncomeInterest
Concept.label: Investment Income, Interest
Concept.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Concept.name: GainLossOnInvestments
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
Concept.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncome
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income
Concept.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
Concept.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.name: InventoryWriteDown
Concept.label: Inventory Write-down
Concept.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

Concept.name: CostOfRevenue
Concept.label: Cost of Revenue
Concept.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

Concept.name: GrossProfit
Concept.label: Gross Profit
Concept.description: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

Concept.name: Revenues
Concept.label: Revenues
Concept.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment

Concept.name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

Concept.name: AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
Concept.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

Concept.name: DepreciationAndAmortization
Concept.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
Concept.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

Concept.name: GoodwillImpairmentLoss
Concept.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
Concept.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

Concept.name: ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefinitelivedExcludingGoodwill
Concept.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
Concept.description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

Concept.name: BusinessExitCosts1
Concept.label: Business Exit Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Includes, but is not limited to, one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and termination benefits associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement. Excludes expenses associated with special or contractual termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: SeveranceCosts1
Concept.label: Severance Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: OperatingExpenses
Concept.label: Operating Expenses
Concept.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

Concept.name: OperatingLeaseExpense
Concept.label: Operating Lease, Expense
Concept.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

Concept.name: MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense
Concept.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
Concept.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

Concept.name: ProductWarrantyExpense
Concept.label: Product Warranty Expense
Concept.description: The expense charged against earnings for the period pertaining to standard and extended warranties on the entity's goods and services granted to customers.

Concept.name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Concept.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Concept.name: OperatingIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Operating Income (Loss)
Concept.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Concept.name: IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
Concept.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
Concept.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Concept.name: ProfitLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasic
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
Concept.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

Children.Label: [G]Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Tax
[G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Children.Label: [G]Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
Concept.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Concept.name: DebtRelatedCommitmentFeesAndDebtIssuanceCosts
Concept.label: Debt Related Commitment Fees and Debt Issuance Costs
Concept.description: Represents the charge against earnings during the period for commitment fees and debt issuance expenses.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseInterestExpense
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
Concept.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

Concept.name: InterestExpenseDebt
Concept.label: Interest Expense, Debt
Concept.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

Concept.name: InterestExpenseNonoperating
Concept.label: Interest Expense Nonoperating
Concept.description: <nil>

Concept.name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBeforeTax
Concept.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
Concept.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

Concept.name: InvestmentIncomeInterest
Concept.label: Investment Income, Interest
Concept.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Concept.name: GainLossOnInvestments
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
Concept.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncome
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income
Concept.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.name: OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense
Concept.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
Concept.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Concept.name: InventoryWriteDown
Concept.label: Inventory Write-down
Concept.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

Concept.name: CostOfRevenue
Concept.label: Cost of Revenue
Concept.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

Concept.name: GrossProfit
Concept.label: Gross Profit
Concept.description: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

Concept.name: Revenues
Concept.label: Revenues
Concept.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

Concept.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

Children.Label: [G]Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment

Concept.name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment
Concept.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
Concept.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

Concept.name: AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets
Concept.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
Concept.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

Concept.name: FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization
Concept.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
Concept.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

Concept.name: DepreciationAndAmortization
Concept.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
Concept.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

Concept.name: GoodwillImpairmentLoss
Concept.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
Concept.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

Concept.name: ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefinitelivedExcludingGoodwill
Concept.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
Concept.description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

Concept.name: BusinessExitCosts1
Concept.label: Business Exit Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Includes, but is not limited to, one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and termination benefits associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement. Excludes expenses associated with special or contractual termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: SeveranceCosts1
Concept.label: Severance Costs
Concept.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Concept.name: OperatingExpenses
Concept.label: Operating Expenses
Concept.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

Concept.name: OperatingLeaseExpense
Concept.label: Operating Lease, Expense
Concept.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

Concept.name: MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense
Concept.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
Concept.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

Concept.name: ProductWarrantyExpense
Concept.label: Product Warranty Expense
Concept.description: The expense charged against earnings for the period pertaining to standard and extended warranties on the entity's goods and services granted to customers.

Concept.name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Concept.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
Concept.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Concept.name: OperatingIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Operating Income (Loss)
Concept.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Children.Label: [G]Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent

Concept.name: ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax
Concept.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
Concept.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

Children.Label: [G]Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
[G]Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-Sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
Other Comprehensive Income Available For Sale Securities Adjustment Net Of Tax Period Increase Decrease

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableForSaleSecuritiesAdjustmentNetOfTax
Concept.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
Concept.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForSaleOfSecuritiesNetOfTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
Concept.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

Children.Label: [G]Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
Other Comprehensive Income Derivatives Qualifying As Hedges Net Of Tax Period Increase Decrease

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationAndTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
Concept.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

Children.Label: [G]Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
Other Comprehensive Income Foreign Currency Transaction And Translation Adjustment Net Of Tax Period Increase Decrease

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
Concept.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPortionAttributableToParent
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
Concept.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

Children.Label: [G]Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

Children.Label: [G]Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

Children.Label: Other Comprehensive Income Loss Net Of Tax Period Increase Decrease
Other Comprehensive Income Available For Sale Securities Adjustment Net Of Tax Period Increase Decrease

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableForSaleSecuritiesAdjustmentNetOfTax
Concept.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
Concept.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassificationAdjustmentFromAOCIForSaleOfSecuritiesNetOfTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
Concept.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

Children.Label: Other Comprehensive Income Derivatives Qualifying As Hedges Net Of Tax Period Increase Decrease

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedgeGainLossAfterReclassificationAndTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
Concept.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

Children.Label: Other Comprehensive Income Foreign Currency Transaction And Translation Adjustment Net Of Tax Period Increase Decrease

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurrencyTransactionAndTranslationAdjustmentNetOfTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
Concept.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Concept.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

Concept.name: NetIncomeLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
Concept.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: ProfitLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Children.Label: Adjustments To Additional Paid In Capital

Concept.name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalOther
Concept.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Other
Concept.description: Amount of other increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC).

Children.Label: Adjustments To Additional Paid In Capital Sharebased Compensation Requisite Service Period Recognition

Concept.name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalSharebasedCompensationRequisiteServicePeriodRecognitionValue
Concept.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
Concept.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

Concept.name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarrantIssued
Concept.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Warrant Issued
Concept.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from the issuance of warrants. Includes allocation of proceeds of debt securities issued with detachable stock purchase warrants.

Children.Label: [G]Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest

Concept.name: NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNonredeemableNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.

Concept.name: ProfitLoss
Concept.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Concept.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Concept.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax
Concept.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Concept.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

Concept.name: ReclassificationsOfTemporaryToPermanentEquity
Concept.label: Reclassifications of Temporary to Permanent Equity
Concept.description: The difference between the carrying amount of a financial instrument subject to a registration payment arrangement recorded as temporary equity prior to adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2 and the carrying amount reclassified to permanent equity upon the adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2. Recorded as a cumulative effect adjustment to the beginning balance of retained earnings. Does not apply to registration payment arrangements that are no longer outstanding upon adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2.

Children.Label: Stock Issued During Period Sharebased Compensation

Concept.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptionsExercised
Concept.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
Concept.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

Concept.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions
Concept.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
Concept.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

Children.Label: Stock Issued During Period Value Conversion Of Convertible Securities Net Of Adjustments

Concept.name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEquityComponentOfConvertibleDebt
Concept.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Equity Component of Convertible Debt
Concept.description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.

Concept.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfConvertibleSecurities
Concept.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
Concept.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

Concept.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStockPurchasePlan
Concept.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
Concept.description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

Concept.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues
Concept.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
Concept.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

Concept.name: StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Concept.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
